Description: A sample CloudFormation template for an EC2 Instance with parameters for reusability.

ImageId.Description: The AMI ID for the EC2 instance (e.g., an Amazon Linux AMI).

KeyName.Description: The name of an existing EC2 KeyPair to enable SSH access.
KeyName.ConstraintDescription: Must be the name of an existing EC2 KeyPair.

PublicIp.Description: Public IP address of the newly created EC2 instance

InstanceId.Description: Instance ID of the newly created EC2 instance
